root.message: The SDG_SERIES_DESCR field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Birth rate in adolescents aged 10 to 14 years and 15 to 19 years (birth rate in adolescents per 1,000 women)
Taxa natalidade em adolescente de 10 a 14 anos e 15 a 19 anos (natalidade em adolescente por 1.000 mulheres)
